(Minime, though you may be able to pick up the signal, how would you even 
know exactly what it is?  How do you know who everyone is?  You haven't been 
in the Predacon base since you've joined.  As long as you've been here, 
you've never been in the Ark.  The only one I've seen Scorponok tell about 
Dark Mouse's fail-safe device, is Megatron or Hell Beast.  I'm not sure 
which.  But, how do you all of a sudden know about it?)
